definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: Were the south china tiger living in the forest around Zhou’s home?
sentences.chinese: 究竟華南虎在周正龍生活的附近山林是否存在？

sentences.english: There are very few left-between ten to thirty live up in the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 現在只剩下有十到三十隻華南虎在山上。

sentences.english: South China Tigers are the most precious of all tigers.
sentences.chinese: 華南虎是最珍貴的老虎。

sentences.english: I didn't know what beliefs supported the South China tiger.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道是什麼信念支撐着華南虎。

sentences.english: South China Tiger is the most endangered subspecies in Panthera tigris.
sentences.chinese: 華南虎是世界上最瀕危的虎亞種。

sentences.english: Abstraet:Guangxi was once an important habitat of the panthera tigris amoyensis in history.
sentences.chinese: 在歷史上，廣西曾是華南虎的一個主要棲息繁衍地。

sentences.english: In the Guangzhou Zoo I saw a South China tiger in its doddering old age.
sentences.chinese: 在廣州動物園我看見一隻老態龍鍾的華南虎。
